meanings.definition: Words printed at the top of a page in a dictionary to help locate the word being looked up.
meanings.sent1: The guidewords at the top of the page made it easy to find the word.
meanings.sent2: I found the word quickly thanks to the guidewords in the dictionary.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf changed all the guidewords in the dictionary to silly words.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like the guidewords in a book, always leading her to the right place.
meanings.sent5: The guidewords acted like a beacon, guiding me to the correct page.

meanings.definition: Words used to help navigate or direct someone in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The hiker followed the guidewords on the trail to reach the summit.
meanings.sent2: The guidewords on the signpost pointed towards the nearest town.
meanings.sent3: The lost puppy seemed to understand the guidewords on the map and led us home.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like the guidewords on a map, always showing the right path.
meanings.sent5: The guidewords on the compass were essential for sailing in the right direction.
